definitions.definition: A former small Turkish unit of weight , variously reckoned as 1.5–3.5 g (0.05–0.12 oz. ).
Alternative form of dirham : a former silver coin weighing one dirhem; modern currencies named for it.

main_definition: ( historical units of measurement ) A former small Turkish unit of weight , variously reckoned as 1.5–3.5 g (0.05–0.12 oz. ).
secondary_definitions: ( chiefly historical Turkish contexts ) Alternative form of dirham : a former silver coin weighing one dirhem; modern currencies named for it.
